author: USA TODAY
title: 20 bucket-list destinations for 2017
text:
20 bucket-list destinations for 2017 Every traveler has a list of dream trips they’d like to take in their lifetime. Post to Facebook 20 bucket-list destinations for 2017 Every traveler has a list of dream trips they’d like to take in their lifetime.  //usat.ly/2hS9LQZ   Join the Nation's Conversation   20 bucket-list destinations for 2017 USA TODAY 8:46 a.m. ET Jan. 4, 2017 Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Every traveler has a list of dream trips they’d like to take in their lifetime. An app called BUCKiTDREAM catalogs that very thing, and they’ve put together a list of the most popular destinations and themes users have shared for their bucket list trips. At No. 1: See the northern lights up close. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 2: Visit the Eiffel Tower. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 3: Visit the Grand Canyon. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 4: Walk the beaches of Bora Bora. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 5: Go on an African safari. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 6: See the Colosseum of Rome. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 7: Ride a gondola in Venice, Italy. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 8: Party in Las Vegas. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 9: Road trip across America. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 10: Relax in the Bahamas. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 11: Snorkeling in the Great Barrier Reef. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 13: Visit the Great Wall of China. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 14: See the Leaning Tower of Pisa. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 15: See the pyramids of Giza. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 16: Visit the Taj Mahal. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 17: Float in the Dead Sea. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 18: Go to the Sydney Opera House. Getty Images/iStockphoto No. 19: Explore the Louvre in Paris. Every traveler has a list of dream trips they’d like to take in their lifetime. An app called BUCKiTDREAM catalogs that very thing, and they’ve put together a list of the most popular destinations and themes users have shared for their bucket list trips. See the slideshow above to learn where your fellow dreamers most want to go in 2017. Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Adelaide in South Australia was named Trip.com’s top Rising Star for 2017. It is home to Kangaroo Island, a nature reserve, as well as the Barossa Valley wine region. Trip.com Cuba has landed on many lists of the hottest destinations for 2017. Trip.com U.S. travelers have been eager to go to Cuba since President Barack Obama eased relations with the island nation located south of Florida. Trip.com Medellin, a city in Colombia, was named a Rising Star by Trip.com. Colombia, in general, was Lonely Planet’s pick for the second best destination for 2017. Trip.com Medellin, a city in Colombia, was named a Rising Star by Trip.com. Colombia, in general, was Lonely Planet’s pick for the second best destination for 2017. Trip.com Tbilisi, the capital of Georgia, was named a top destination for 2017 by both TripAdvisor and Trip.com. Trip.com Tbilisi, the capital of Georgia, was named a top destination for 2017 by both TripAdvisor and Trip.com. Trip.com TripAdvisor named Kihei on Maui’s southwest shore in Hawaii its top rising spot in the USA for 2017. TripAdvisor Park City, Utah is the No. 2 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. TripAdvisor TripAdvisor named Portland, Maine, the No. 3 U.S. destination on the rise for 2017. Portland Harbor is a popular spot for boarding ferries to nearby islands and also for dining on lobster rolls. USATODAY/Nancy Trejos Louisville is the No. 4 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. TripAdvisor Colorado Springs is the No. 5 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. TripAdvisor Houston is the No. 6 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. TripAdvisor Tucson is the No. 7 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. TripAdvisor Pigeon Forge, Tenn., is the No. 8 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. According to Tennessee tourism officials, Pigeon Forge businesses are still operating normally. TripAdvisor Columbus is the No. 9 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. TripAdvisor Jacksonville, Fla., is the No. 10 destination on TripAdvisor’s list of U.S. destinations on the rise for 2017. TripAdvisor South Padre Island in Texas has progressed beyond a Spring Break spot to earn a spot on Trip.com’s Rising Star list for 2017. Trip.com Like this topic?
